comprehensive_overview: UC Solvent Cluster Test (UCSCTest) is a suite of tools for testing parallel quantum chemistry software that uses solvent cluster models. It allows users to easily set up and run tests to evaluate the performance of various quantum chemistry software in the presence of solvent effects.
core_features: Testing parallel quantum chemistry software with solvent cluster models
Setting up and running performance evaluation tests
Evaluating the impact of solvent effects on computational accuracy
Providing a standardized framework for benchmarking quantum chemistry software
